UPDATE E_ROLE SET ROLE_NAME=#roleNameForEdite#, MEMO=#memoForEdite#, ORD=#ordForEdite#, SUBSYSTEM_ID=#subSystemIdForEdite#, MODIFIED_USER=#session.UserInfo.USER_ID#, MODIFIED_DATE=#time()# WHERE ROLE_CODE=#currentIdForEdite#
UPDATE E_ROLE SET PARENT_CODE=#targetId#, MODIFIED_USER=#session.UserInfo.USER_ID#, MODIFIED_DATE=#time()# WHERE ROLE_CODE=#sourceId#
DELETE FROM E_USER_ROLE WHERE ROLE_CODE=#roleCode# AND USER_ID=#userId#
select ROLE_CODE,ROLE_NAME from E_ROLE where ROLE_CODE=#roleCode#
select USER_NAME,LOGIN_ID from E_USER where USER_ID=#userId#
SELECT distinct ROLE_CODE FROM E_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID in (select USER_ID from E_USER_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_CODE IN (select ACCOUNT_CODE from E_USER_ACCOUNT where user_id = #userId#))
select nextval for e_role_seq SEQ_ID from dual
SELECT ROLE_CODE, PARENT_CODE, ROLE_NAME, coalesce(MEMO,'') MEMO , ORD,coalesce(SUBSYSTEM_ID,'-1') SUBSYSTEM_ID FROM E_ROLE WHERE ROLE_CODE=#param.currentIdForEdite#
SELECT (case when (select count(1) from E_ROLE where PARENT_CODE=t.ROLE_CODE) >0 then '0' else '1' end) ISLEAF, ROLE_CODE , ROLE_NAME, PARENT_CODE FROM E_ROLE T ORDER BY T.ORD

select ROLE_CODE,ROLE_NAME,PARENT_CODE,ORD, case when (select count(1) c from e_role dd where dd.parent_code = d.role_code) = 0 then 1 else 0 end ISLEAF from ( SELECT role_code, role_name, parent_code, ORD FROM e_role T WHERE T.role_code IN ( SELECT ROLE_CODE FROM E_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM E_USER_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCOUNT_CODE IN ( SELECT ACCOUNT_CODE FROM E_USER_ACCOUNT WHERE user_id = #userId# ) ) ) ORDER BY ord ) d
